page.description: The ADO Record Set Genie allows you to create an Xdialog form that is bound to an ADO data source. The Xdialog form will allow you to view, edit, delete, and enter records. The genie is available while the Code Editor is open. Select Code > More Genies > ADO Record Set to display the ADO Genie. The genie leads you through the process of:

case.description: entering user name and password (if necessary)

section.description: The result is the Xbasic code to insert into an Xdialog form.
